name: Podder
overview: The people of the City of Pd, through thousands of years became very adept in the ways of bestowing their machines with perception. This was to be their downfall! One black day the machines took hold and banished the people to the desert wastes. Exiled engineers have managed to salvage a podder, rebuild it and fit it with a limited arsenal. Can you collect the 107 parts and rebuild the pod monitor and so restore stability?
